articles.title: Spectacular Video Shows Massive Fireball Lighting Up Night Sky Over US - NDTV
articles.description: A spectacular fireball on Friday was spotted zooming over several US states, including Indiana and Wisconsin. The American Meteor Society (AMS) shared a video of the sighting and said that it received around 150 reports of the fireball.
articles.content:
This fireball was a "random occurrence" and not associated with any meteor shower.

articles.title: Canada pledges $1 million for monkeypox prevention amid botched vaccine rollout across North America - Xtra Magazine
articles.description: The funding comes as the World Health Organization declares monkeypox a “global health emergency”
articles.content:
As the World Health Organization declares monkeypox a global health emergency, the Canadian government is pledging one million dollars to LGBTQ2S+ groups to prevent the virus spread.

articles.author: Will DuPree, Rich Segal
articles.title: VIDEO: Central Texans dazzled by late night fireball sightings - KXAN.com
articles.description: The American Meteor Society (AMS), a nonprofit that tracks meteor astronomy, received at least 219 reports of people seeing the fireball Sunday mostly in Texas, but some even spotted it in states like Oklahoma and Louisiana.
articles.content:
LOCKHART, Texas (KXAN) A bright fireball streaking across the Sunday night sky dazzled Central Texas residents whose home security cameras captured the rare sighting.
